creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts and in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
description: slightly asymmetrical cylindrical shape with slightly outward flaring rim; thick foot ring; irregular bulbous ridge near bottom; thick glaze:  blue-green and browns, with dull and shiny areas
medium: Stoneware with feldspar and clay glaze
title: Shino sake cup
